data.name: Stardust Galaxy Warriors - Strike Update OST
data.detailed_description:
Five new tunes for Stardust Galaxy Warriors: Stellar Climax! In the free Strike Update, boss fights are accompanied with special music tracks to go with the hectic battles. These songs are now available as free DLC for owners of the game, also including a full-length version of the Stellar Climax release trailer track!

Tracklist:

  • 01 - Stellar Climax ~ SGW: SC Trailer Theme - 02:56
  • 02 - Gearsplitter EX ~ Generic Boss Theme - 3:53
  • 03 - Sea Attacker ~ Marine Boss Theme - 3:29
  • 04 - Insects ~ Organic Boss Theme - 3:13
  • 05 - Rise of The Machines ~ Mechanical Boss Theme - 2:53

Technical Info:

  • Format: MP3
  • Running time: 16:21
  • Total size: 39.4 MB
  • Bitrate: 320 kbps
  • Stereo

Composed and produced by Matias Lehtoranta with the exception of Track #1 by Kalle Kaunisto.

data.short_description: Boss music tracks from Stardust Galaxy Warriors: Stellar Climax Strike Update!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or newer
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
